definitions.definition: Any member of the mammalian infraclass Marsupialia , including those where the female has a pouch in which it rears its young through early infancy, such as kangaroos , koalas , wombats and opossums , as well as the pouchless shrew opossums .

main_definition: Any member of the mammalian infraclass Marsupialia , including those where the female has a pouch in which it rears its young through early infancy, such as kangaroos , koalas , wombats and opossums , as well as the pouchless shrew opossums .
